io.spine.server.model

Class HandlerMethod<C extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.model.HandlerMethod<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - the type of the message context or Empty if a context parameter is never used
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandHandlerMethod, EventApplierMethod, EventReactorMethod, EventSubscriberMethod, RejectionReactorMethod, RejectionSubscriberMethod

    public abstract class HandlerMethod<C extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract base for wrappers over methods handling messages.

    Two message handlers are equivalent when they refer to the same method on the same object (not class).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  HandlerMethod.Factory<H extends HandlerMethod>
      The interface for factory objects that can filter Method objects that represent handler methods and create corresponding HandlerMethod instances that wrap those methods.

      • getFirstParamType

        public static java.lang.Class<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message> getFirstParamType(java.lang.reflect.Method handler)
        Returns the class of the first parameter of the passed handler method object.

        It is expected that the first parameter of the passed method is always of a class implementing Message.

        Parameters:
        handler - the method object to take first parameter type from
        Returns:
        the class of the first method parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if the first parameter isn't a class implementing Message

      • toList

        protected static java.util.List<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message> toList(@Nullable
                                                                              java.lang.Object output)
        Casts a handling result to a list of event messages.
        Parameters:
        output - the command handler method return value. Could be a Message, a list of messages, or null.
        Returns:
        the list of event messages or an empty list if null is passed

        Parameters:

        context - the context of the message
        Returns:

      • whyFailed

        protected HandlerMethodFailedException whyFailed(java.lang.Object target,
                                                 com.google.protobuf.Message message,
                                                 C context,
                                                 java.lang.Exception cause)
        Creates an exception containing information on the failure of the handler method invocation.
        Parameters:
        target - the object which method was invoked
        message - the message dispatched to the object
        context - the context of the message
        cause - exception instance thrown by the invoked method
        Returns:
        the exception thrown during the invocation

      • getFullName

        public java.lang.String getFullName()
        Returns a full name of the handler method.

        The full name consists of a fully qualified class name of the target object and the method name separated with a dot character.

        Returns:
        full name of the subscriber
